Title: Prohibits transportation of animals in open areas of motor vehicle unless such animals are enclosed or restrained
Summary: Prohibits the transportation of an animal in any open area of a motor vehicle which is intended for any load unless such area is fully enclosed or the animal is in a cage or container, or restrained so it's unable to leave or be thrown from the vehicle; imposes fines for the violation of the provisions thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง1222-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to transportation of animals in a motor vehicle
